review_blob: Citrus is the overriding factor of this ale. It is drinkable and refreshing. Good colour but weak head. Not the best, but I would have another.
Good hoppy flavour that lingers on the pallette. Looks good but never really delivers in the way you expect. Good session beer though.
Nice easy drinking beer. Smooth on the palate with a very pleasant aftertaste. Not the best but certainly not the worst.
Lovely bottled beer being sold off for 99p in morrisons. Pours well looks great and tastes of summer with a fresh but bitter after taste. Very enjoyable.
Bought the beer based on the association with the great dame Edith Cavell. Pleasent aroma, quite murky but tastes well. Good beer that tastes much stronger than the 3.7. Enjoyed.
Special offer from lidl. Nice looking summer ale that is very pleasing on the palate. Keeps its head well throughout and is a pleasing, effortless drink.
Passable bitter lovely colour and nice head. Aroma almost non existent but tastes good. A lidl special at 90p. Enjoyable ale.
Far to medicinal for me. Really did not like this.looks good and smells good but the cloves are just overpowering.
